Class GuiController

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.GuiController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class GuiController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Main GUI Controller for the Tetris game. Responsible for: - Rendering the game board, falling brick, and next pieces preview - Handling user input (keyboard events) - Managing game state (pause, game over, animations) - Displaying score and high score - Showing the held piece in the hold window - Animating line clears with visual feedback The controller communicates with GameController for game logic and receives updates via ViewData objects.

      Specified by:

    • setDifficultyLevel

      public void setDifficultyLevel(int level)
      Sets the difficulty level for the game. Valid levels: 1, 5, 10, 15
      Parameters:
      level - the difficulty level (1=Normal, 15=Extreme)

    • setObstacleMode

      public void setObstacleMode(boolean enable)
      Enables or disables Obstacle Mode.
      Parameters:
      enable - true to enable obstacle mode, false to disable

    • initGameView

      public void initGameView(int[][] boardMatrix, ViewData brick)
      Initialize the game view with board matrix and first brick. Called once at game startup to set up all UI components.
      Parameters:
      boardMatrix - The game board matrix (width x height)
      brick - The first falling brick data

    • initializeHoldPreview

      public void initializeHoldPreview()

    • updateHoldPreview

      public void updateHoldPreview(ViewData heldBrick)
      Updates the held piece preview display. Called when the player swaps pieces with hold feature.
      Parameters:
      heldBrick - ViewData of the held brick (null if no brick is held)

    • refreshGameBackground

      public void refreshGameBackground(int[][] board)
      Refresh the game background display after board changes. Updates the visual representation of merged bricks on the board.
      Parameters:
      board - The current game board matrix

    • animateLineClear

      public void animateLineClear(ClearRow clearRow, int[][] beforeMatrix, Runnable onFinished)
      Animate the clearing of complete lines with flash and collapse effects.
      Parameters:
      clearRow - The information about cleared rows
      beforeMatrix - The board state before clearing
      onFinished - Callback to execute when animation completes

    • showScoreBonus

      public void showScoreBonus(int bonus)
      Display score bonus popup animation.
      Parameters:
      bonus - The bonus points to display

    • bindScore

      Binds the score label to the game's score property for real-time updates.
      Parameters:
      integerProperty - The Score's observable property

    • setEventListener

      public void setEventListener(InputEventListener eventListener)
      Sets the event listener (GameController) to handle user input events. Required for decoupling GUI from game logic.
      Parameters:
      eventListener - The InputEventListener implementation to receive input events

    • activateObstacleMode

      public void activateObstacleMode()
      Enable obstacle mode after initialization is complete. Called after the game board is initialized.
